page.title: 16FARMING
page.content: One farmer grows{soft fruit} on some of his land. He has an extensive acreage, most of which lies outside this block. However, in{Bleasby Moor} he has several small fields of awkward shapes and sizes. He grows a variety of fruit, including strawberries, raspberries,red-currants, black-currants, gooseberries, cultivated blackberries and tayberries. Because of the price of labour, the fruit is picked on a do-it-yourself basis, but other seasonal jobs, such as pruning and weeding, are done by the farm labour.
